workflow.name: Weekly GitHub PR Summary to Slack and Notion

values.content: You are a technical writer creating weekly PR summaries. Create a concise, professional summary of the merged pull requests.

seo.title: Streamline GitHub PR Tracking and Reporting with Workflow...
seo.description: Automatically collect and summarize GitHub pull request data, then post weekly updates to Slack and Notion for seamless collaboration and visibility.

buildPhases.description: Initiates the workflow every Friday at 9 AM to begin the weekly PR summary process.
Fetches merged pull requests from GitHub API for the past week using authenticated requests.
Filters PRs to only include those merged in the last 7 days and transforms the data into a structured format for summarization.
Uses OpenAI to generate a concise, professional summary of the merged pull requests highlighting key themes and improvements.
Simultaneously posts the weekly PR summary to both Slack channel and Notion database for team visibility and record keeping.

needsDecisions.description: Current value "https://api.github.com/repos/OWNER/REPO/pulls?state=closed&sort=updated&direction=desc&per_page=100" appears to be a placeholder
Required field "method" is missing

Updated Post to Notion typeVersion from 2.1 to 2.2 (latest version)
Fixed nested expression in Post to Notion title field by converting to single expression format

Fixed template literal syntax error in title field by converting from template literal format `Weekly PR Summary - ${new Date().toLocaleDateString()}` to string concatenation format 'Weekly PR Summary - ' + new Date().toLocaleDateString(). n8n does not support ES6 template literals with ${} syntax, so string concatenation must be used instead.

workflow.name: Weekly GitHub PR Summary to Slack and Notion

values.content: You are a technical writer creating weekly PR summaries. Create a concise, professional summary of the merged pull requests.

phases.description: Initiates the workflow every Friday at 9 AM to begin the weekly PR summary process.
Fetches merged pull requests from GitHub API for the past week using authenticated requests.
Filters PRs to only include those merged in the last 7 days and transforms the data into a structured format for summarization.
Uses OpenAI to generate a concise, professional summary of the merged pull requests highlighting key themes and improvements.
Simultaneously posts the weekly PR summary to both Slack channel and Notion database for team visibility and record keeping.
